field.name: help
field.p: De click aquí para agregar un Nueva Habilidad.

field.name: help
field.p: No hay ningún inicio de sesión registrado.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to register a Team.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to register a Configuration.
Here are the basic settings with which the system works, such as mail settings, etc. You can use several configurations but only one active, the settings used in the order of priority that place.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to register a Level.

The levels are milestones that collaborators who are active are reached with the increase in points. To create the first level you must check the box class. Levels has a sequence, to create a new level must be specified that comes and points can never be less than or equal to this.

field.name: help
field.p: De click aquí para crear una nueva Área.
Cada Área es cada una de la partes en las que está dividida la empresa, cada una costa de actividades que son cumplidas por los colaboradores

field.name: help
field.p: Click to register an Activity.
Are the activities performed in each of the Areas of cooperation are using in creating events for designated activities to collaborators depending on the Area to which they belong.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to register a place.
The place is the physical spaces where events are held and services. The description should put the exact address.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to register a Collaborator.

The collaborators are each of the people who are part of the ministry in some way. The collaborator is divided into two groups: those involved in the recordings, record their attendance at the services and keep track of score, and can be active, inactive or blocked. And people who belong to the ministry but do not keep a register of sites registering their attendance.

record.field: All collaborators who are actively involved in ministry.
Here you can change the scoring record of employees, increases in points are marked with blue, red and decreases in employees that green incoporaron ministry.
Here you can see the track of your score changes, increases in points are marked with blue, red and decreases in your incorporation into the ministry.

field.name: help
field.p: Click aquí para agregar una nueva Etiqueta.
Las etiquetas sirven para poder identificar y buscar más rapidamente los archivos.

field.name: help
field.p: Click aquí para agregar una nuevo Archivo.
Aquí puedes almacenar archivos para poderlos compartir con los colaboradores.

field.name: help
field.p: Aquí puedes ver todos los archivos que has sido compartidos con los colaboradores.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to register a Service.

Services are the names of the events. These contain the information of the service start time, end time. These can be specified in several events. You have to specify the time of entry, it is mandatory that the time of entry must be before the start time. You have to specify the minutes that collaborators will have to register your timely assistance. It also specifies the time limit, this is the time that the employees have maximum after the time of entry to record attendance, but is considered a delay.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to register a Event.

record.field: Here you can check the times that collaborators are assigned to events.
Here you can review the attendance records of collaborators also can review statistics.
Here you can see all your attendance record

field.name: help
field.p: Click to register a Massive email.

field.name: help
field.p: Click to register a Web site.
Here you can see the websites of the collaborators. They can be used to record social networks.

record.field: Here you can search people who are discipling and go keeping track of progress.

field.name: help
field.p: No suspensions record..!!

record.field: Here is a record of all the suspensions that have had to find one, use the filters..

field.name: help
field.p: No Replaces record..!!

field.name: help
field.p: Below are the times you have replaced all someone or have been replaced

record.field: Here you can add or remove points to Collaborators. The reason for this change is made to an Collaborator points must be referenced very clear and detailed.
You can Close the Past Events that are still On going, so you have updated the system.
Here you can send emails to Collaborators with their registration data for some reason were not sent to the Collaborator when added to the system.
Here you can print a list of people who are part of the ministry, check the fields to be displayed in the report.
Here you can print a list of the events are on the calendar. You can also filter the events using the fields in the wizard.

field.name: help
field.p: There are no ongoing events in which you have assigned activities..!!
